title: Animal Sound Samples
longDescription:
Preview Ambient Sounds : https://youtu.be/6CqCsQCOn1c

List: Animal Sound Samples List




560 animal sound samples to be used with your cg animated wildlife or domestic animals.


This samples will complete your visuals for different birds, amphibians, mammals and insects with fitting sound.




The samples (except ambient mixes) are as dry/clean as possible, so that it can be used with any reverberation environment.


They work like a well cut out transparent texture, to be layered and mixed together with your existing environment sound design. It should blend just right in and feel as if its a real life animal existing in front or above making sound even without any 3D object to represent it.


Just set your sound attenuation spatialization asset to binaural and plug it into your ambient sound and you are set up to enjoy these sounds of nature within your virtual world.

This will add another layer of immersion especially for VR Games/ Games that use HRTF sound




Customer Service


As always feel free to add any questions, requests or any issue with this package on the projects page question section

As with all my products, I will continue to improve them and add further samples to the packages as a free service.

You can visit my Unreal Engine Forum Support thread here
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 560 well crafted animal sound samples 
  •  natural, clean, precise sound


Number of Audio Waves: 560

Number of Audio Cues: 564

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz ; 48,000 Hz

Do Sound FX loop: partly, 7 loops included

Minutes of audio provided: 17:00 Minutes : Seconds

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
